source.Select: SELECT CCURTYPE,TO_CHAR(CCURDATE,'yyyymmdd') CCURDATE,RATIOFROM,CCURFROM,RATIOTO,CCURTO,CCURRATE,TIMESTAMP FROM SAP_EXCH_RATE WHERE CCURDATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-6) AND SYSDATE
source.Update: UPDATE SAP_EXCH_RATE SET RATIOFROM=:RATIOFROM::NUMERIC,RATIOTO=:RATIOTO::NUMERIC,CCURRATE=:CCURRATE::NUMERIC WHERE CCURDATE=to_date(:CCURDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND CCURFROM=:CCURFROM AND CCURTO=:CCURTO
source.Check: SELECT CCURDATE, CCURFROM, CCURTO FROM SAP_EXCH_RATE WHERE CCURDATE=to_date(:CCURDATE,'yyyyMMdd') AND CCURFROM=:CCURFROM AND CCURTO=:CCURTO
